channel.title: [Pi] Portal Help please
channel.description:
Where would i go to set a portal to tele me somewhere?
Also - How could i make an Npc talk when u click on him? Such as say "Hello!" when u click on him?
Thank you so much ;D

item.title: [Pi] Portal Help please
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

Tut to NPC dialogue - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=490227.0 (I did not make)

For portals try adding this into clickingobjects.java -

Case (objectId): c.getPA().startTeleport(coordX, CoordY); break;

Read full topic
